channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Job marked complete- but not, 19th December
item.description:
13.30pm job marked COMPLETE by Fix my Street. But no action has been taken. See photo. Is there a problem with the app? Bags of rubbish on Lynmouth Road were reported via this app. Marked complete, but notWhat's going wrong? This is happening repeatedly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Offensive Graffiti, 19th December
item.description:
The words "dictator" and "Kids" are used in this graffiti. It is on the side of a footpath which is adjacent to a primary school and residential homes. Very inappropriate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Summers Lane, North Finchley, Greater London
